sentences.en: Also, use moldy disk to drive also cause damage.
sentences.cn: 同时，使用发霉磁盘对驱动器也会造成损坏。

sentences.en: And when tines found hidden mushrooms or wild chives, the moldy, spicy scents a perfect blend.
sentences.cn: 尖齿碰到藏在下面的蘑菇或野细香葱时,则散发出令人回味无穷的恰到好处的霉香味.

sentences.en: Basic smell of the mankind has 4 kinds, namely flavour of sweet, acerbity, candy and moldy.
sentences.cn: 人类的基本嗅觉有四种, 即香 、 酸 、 糖味和腐臭.

sentences.en: But now see how dry and moldy it is.
sentences.cn: 看哪,现在都干了,长了霉了.

sentences.en: Current crop dried tapioca material, double - skinned, and dried, without moldy, white nature color, without insects.
sentences.cn: 当年作物且干木薯原料, 双重被剥皮的, 被烘干, 无霉变,原白色, 无虫蛀.

sentences.en: Germinate, is a new atmosphere; Moldy, is a mood.
sentences.cn: 发芽, 是一种新气象; 发霉, 是一种心情.

sentences.en: He should know better than to eat moldy food.
sentences.cn: 他不会笨到吃发霉的食物.

sentences.en: Hong Kong property prices rising Yang 1,000 frenzied stew slowly value for beta . Moldy plate showing.
sentences.cn: 香港豪宅房价疯狂上涨杨千?霉盘炖值让β蚍?

sentences.en: I can turn his Gatorade into wine and give him some moldy bread, but there's nothing I can do once he steps on that court.
sentences.cn: 我可以把他喝的饮料变成白酒，然后在给他一些发霉的面包，但是只要他一踏入球场我们就无能为力了。

sentences.en: If the food gets moldy, use less next time.
sentences.cn: 如果食物发霉, 下次就给少一点.

sentences.en: If the house is dirty the trip will be bad, and there's nothing worse than coming back to a dirty house and a fridge full of moldy food.
sentences.cn: 如果房子不干净，那么旅行也不会顺利，而且没有比旅行之后回到一个脏乱的屋子和充满发霉的食物的冰箱更加糟糕的事情了。

sentences.en: People feel sorry for you. If you don't want the rice bowl, it won't get moldy.
sentences.cn: 人家可怜你, 你不要饭碗, 饭碗不会发霉.

sentences.en: The Bread was going Bad and would soon Be moldy.
sentences.cn: 这面包要变坏了,很快就会发霉了.

sentences.en: The curtain in the showering room is moldy.
sentences.cn: 淋浴室里的窗帘发了霉.

sentences.en: The only thing she had to eat was stale, moldy bread.
sentences.cn: 她仅有能吃的东西就是不新鲜而且发霉的面包.

sentences.en: We are really at a loss to understand why your lot was found moldy and worm - eaten.
sentences.cn: 这真叫我们难于理解,给你们的那批货怎么发霉了,甚至被虫咬了.

sentences.en: We are sorry to inform you that the goods arrive in a moldy condition.
sentences.cn: 我们很遗憾地通知贵方,货物运达时已经发霉.

words.tran_cn: 塑造；使发霉；用模子制作
